idea:
Innowit is a boutique firm with unique hands on approach to helping Jewellery industry with all aspects of Digital Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Marketing (SEO & SEM), Branding & Design,Printing, Mobile Marketing and Email Marketing.

Our focus is to bell the CAT which stands for Creativity, Analytics and Technology and we leverage this to deliver across digital campaigns be it media driven or creative led campaigns.
name: Innowit

idea: helps connecting small farmers across India and consumers through our wide variety of natural products. Chemical usage, modification in the genetics of seeds and, use of pesticides are neither promoted by us nor by our partner farmers. We believe in the health, wellness and, care of our consumers. We aim to satisfy our consumers with healthy and natural food products which are filled with nutrients and flavour at their doorstep. Neither a colouring agent nor a preservative is mixed with our products, keeping the original flavour and aroma intact. Our partner farmers use heirloom seeds that have been passed on for generations in their families to get you the authentic taste of spices. The products are exclusively crafted by us to meet the desi flavour and to satisfy our desi hearts.
name: SAS LIFE E ORGANIC FARMERS PRODUCER COMPANY LIMITED

idea: Glint Consultancy Services LLP is a Mumbai based, leading Consultancy firm providing end to end operations/solutions and Facility Management Services for the business specializing in top quality Manpower Supply, Human Resources Management, Housekeeping Services, Mechanized Cleaning Services, Ground Handling Services at Airports, Fund Management, Certification Services, Stationery supply & other allied services and not limited to the above mentioned services/business. Glint Consultancy Services LLP mainly focuses in being highly client oriented and using state of the art technology embracing high ethical standards. We aim to deliver a constant high level of customized services, sustain and exceed our customer’s expectation and to provide services with professionalism integrity and value for money.
name: GLINT CONSULTANCY SERVICES LLP
